COSMOSformat

Class V0Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • COSMOSformat.COSMOScontentFormat
      • COSMOSformat.V0Component

  • public class V0Component
extends COSMOScontentFormat
    This class extends the COSMOScontentFormat base class to define a V0 record. It defines the method to parse the V0 data array and provides getters to access the array.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class COSMOSformat.COSMOScontentFormat

    • Constructor Detail

      • V0Component

        public V0Component(java.lang.String procType)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        procType - identifies the data type of raw accel., uncorrected accel., etc. of this component object (see data product names in VFileConstants)

    • Method Detail

      • parseDataSection

        public int parseDataSection(int startLine,
                            java.lang.String[] infile)
                     throws FormatException
        This method defines the steps for parsing a V0 data record, which contains an integer data array.
        Overrides:
        parseDataSection in class COSMOScontentFormat
        Parameters:
        startLine - line number for the start of the data section
        infile - contents of the input file, one string per line
        Returns:
        updated line number now pointing to first line after data section
        Throws:
        FormatException - if unable to extract format information or to convert text values to numeric

      • VrecToText

        public java.lang.String[] VrecToText()
        This method converts the internal record to a text format. Items already in text format are copied in, and numeric tables are converted according to their data type.
        Overrides:
        VrecToText in class COSMOScontentFormat
        Returns:
        an array of strings (text) of the COSMOS file in output format

      • updateV0

        public void updateV0(java.lang.String inname)
              throws FormatException,
                     SmException
        Updates certain parameters for the V0 file to facilitate its rewrite out as single channel. The array output format is checked in the configuration file and updated for the outgoing V0, the output file name is set and record id and authorization picked up to determine the output directory and file name
        Parameters:
        inname - the file name for this record
        Throws:
        FormatException - if field width is invalid
        SmException - if unable to build the new format line

      • buildNewDataFormatLine

        public void buildNewDataFormatLine(java.lang.String units,
                                   int unitscode,
                                   java.lang.String dataType)
                            throws SmException
        This method builds a new data format line for writing out the V0 files, and is used when the data packing method has changed to Single Column.
        Parameters:
        units - output units, which will be counts for V0
        unitscode - units code for counts
        dataType - for V0 this will be acceleration or raw accel.
        Throws:
        SmException - if unable to correctly format the values

      • getDataLength

        public int getDataLength()
        Getter for the length of the data array.
        Returns:
        the length of the data array.

      • getDataArray

        public int[] getDataArray()
        Getter for a copy of the data array reference. Used to access the entire array during data processing.
        Returns:
        a copy of the array reference
